author: stsp
msg: Make the hotcopy tests compare all files in source and destination.
The tests were comparing the output of 'svnadmin dump' which effectively
only compares a subset of the copied files. We now perform a byte-per-byte
comparison on all files, with special handling of rep-cache.db where table
rows need to be compared because the rep-cache.db files always differ.
(hotcopy_dot, hotcopy_incremental): Use the new helper instead of 'dump'
